name: fusion-ui
description: A sleak dark UI theme, that is best complemented by the Dark Bint syntax theme
readme: # Fusion UI Theme **Screenshot showing the Fusion UI Theme with the Dark Bint Syntax Theme** The **Fusion UI Theme** is a fork of the accents-ui theme that has been given a facelift. It is designed to go best with [@Murriouz](https://github.com/Murriouz)'s [*Dark Bint Syntax Theme*](https://github.com/Murriouz/dark-bint-syntax) and with [@brendanblackwood](https://github.com/brendanblackwood)'s [*Material Monokai Syntax Theme*](https://atom.io/themes/material-monokai-syntax). **Screenshot showing the fusion-ui theme being used with the Material Monokai theme** ## Installation Merely open up a terminal and run: ```bash $ apm install fusion-ui ```
